name: tangram.cartodb
description: Library to render webgl maps using tangram and carto.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build-test && npm run test-local
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && npm run build-test && npm run test-remote
scripts.build: npm run build-bundle -- -o dist/tangram.cartodb.debug.js && npm run build-minify
scripts.build-bundle: $(npm bin)/browserify src/module.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins transform-runtime ] -t brfs -s TangramCarto -p browserify-derequire --debug
scripts.build-minify: $(npm bin)/uglifyjs dist/tangram.cartodb.debug.js -c warnings=false -m -o dist/tangram.cartodb.min.js && npm run build-size
scripts.build-size: gzip dist/tangram.cartodb.min.js -c | wc -c | awk '{kb=$1/1024; print kb}' OFMT='%.0fk minified+gzipped'
scripts.watch: $(npm bin)/budo src/module.js:dist/tangram.cartodb.debug.js --port 8000 --cors --live -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins transform-runtime ] -t brfs -s TangramCarto
